name: EbonSide
description:
The brand new indie game hitting the screen, The curse of the ebony sword: Ebonside!


A Indie JRPG with a lot of features from crafting to dreaded boss fights!

As time pasts, the land that once housed life now houses a giant evil. And only you can stop it

Battle the darkness with classic classes from the old days of JRPGs with some new ones as well!
With a warrior, Black mage, Thief or a Dark Artisan, you can unlock and change into any class that
fits your playstyle!

Craft from hundreds of crafting trees! From carpentry, smiting, cooking and more!

Breed and race your own kakata!

AND FIGHT BIG FRICKING MONSTERS!

Key points!
* Half decent story!
* Hundreds of Crafting recipes to learn and craft!
* Nine Classes to play and master!
* Rare monsters to find and hunt!
* Big Chungus
* A loveable cast of Characters!
*A Real time Day and Night system
